name: total-app
description: Cross-platform Desktop / Mobile / Web application starter.

scripts.postinstall: echo RUN postinstall && svelte-kit sync && tsx scripts/assets-clean.ts
scripts.svelte:prebuild: echo RUN svelte:prebuild && rimraf .svelte-kit && rimraf build && svelte-kit sync && tsx scripts/assets-copy.ts
scripts.svelte:predev: echo RUN svelte:predev   && rimraf dev-dist                    && svelte-kit sync && tsx scripts/assets-copy.ts
scripts.dev:http: echo RUN dev:http                                      && pnpm svelte:predev     && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*             NO_HTTPS=1 vite dev --port 3000
scripts.dev:https: echo RUN dev:https                                     && pnpm svelte:predev     && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*                        vite dev --port 4443
scripts.dev-sw:http: echo RUN dev-sw:http                                   && pnpm svelte:predev     && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true NO_HTTPS=1 vite dev --port 3000
scripts.dev-sw:https: echo RUN dev-sw:https                                  && pnpm svelte:predev     && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true            vite dev --port 4443
scripts.dev-claims: echo RUN dev-claims                                    && pnpm svelte:predev     && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true SW=true                 CLAIMS=true vite dev --port 3000
scripts.dev-destroy: echo RUN dev-destroy                                   && pnpm svelte:predev     && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true         SW_DESTROY=true             vite dev --port 3000
scripts.dev-claims-destroy: echo RUN dev-claims-destroy                            && pnpm svelte:predev     && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true SW=true SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true vite dev --port 3000
scripts.build: echo RUN build                                          && pnpm build:base && cap sync android && cap sync ios
scripts.build:base: echo RUN build:base                                     && pnpm svelte:prebuild   && vite build
scripts.build:netlify: echo RUN build:netlify                                  && cross-env NETLIFY=true pnpm build:only-sw
scripts.build:vercel: echo RUN build:vercel                                   && cross-env VERCEL=true  pnpm build:only-sw
scripts.build:only: echo RUN build:only                                     && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*                                                     pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only-reloadsw: echo RUN build:only-reloadsw                            && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*                                     RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only-claims: echo RUN build:only-claims                              && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*                         CLAIMS=true                 pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only-reloadsw-claims: echo RUN build:only-reloadsw-claims                     && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*                         CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only-destroy: echo RUN build:only-destroy                             && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*         SW_DESTROY=true                             pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only-reloadsw-destroy: echo RUN build:only-reloadsw-destroy                    && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*         SW_DESTROY=true             RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only-claims-destroy: echo RUN build:only-claims-destroy                      && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*         SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true                 pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only-reloadsw-claims-destroy: echo RUN build:only-reloadsw-claims-destroy             && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*         SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only-sw: echo RUN build:only-sw                                  && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true                                             pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only-sw-reloadsw: echo RUN build:only-sw-reloadsw                         && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true                             RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only-sw-claims: echo RUN build:only-sw-claims                           && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true                 CLAIMS=true                 pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only-sw-claims-reloadsw: echo RUN build:only-sw-claims-reloadsw                  && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true                 CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only-sw-destroy: echo RUN build:only-sw-destroy                          && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true SW_DESTROY=true                             pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only-sw-reloadsw-destroy: echo RUN build:only-sw-reloadsw-destroy                 && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true SW_DESTROY=true             RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only-sw-claims-destroy: echo RUN build:only-sw-claims-destroy                   && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true                 pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only-sw-reloadsw-claims-destroy: echo RUN build:only-sw-reloadsw-claims-destroy          && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm build:base
scripts.build:only:all: echo RUN build:only:all                                 && pnpm build:only && pnpm build:only-reloadsw && pnpm build:only-claims && pnpm build:only-reloadsw-claims && pnpm build:only-destroy && pnpm build:only-reloadsw-destroy && pnpm build:only-claims-destroy && pnpm build:only-reloadsw-claims-destroy && pnpm build:only-sw && pnpm build:only-sw-reloadsw && pnpm build:only-sw-claims && pnpm build:only-sw-claims-reloadsw && pnpm build:only-sw-destroy && pnpm build:only-sw-reloadsw-destroy && pnpm build:only-sw-claims-destroy && pnpm build:only-sw-reloadsw-claims-destroy
scripts.preview:http: echo RUN preview:http                                  &&  cross-env NO_HTTPS=1 vite preview --port 4173
scripts.test: echo RUN test                                           && pnpm run test:integration && pnpm run test:unit
scripts.test:integration: echo RUN test:integration                               && cross-env NO_HTTPS=1 playwright test
scripts.test:integration:debug: echo RUN test:integration:debug                         && cross-env NO_HTTPS=1 playwright test --headed --timeout=0
scripts.check: echo RUN check                                          && svelte-kit sync && svelte-check --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json
scripts.check:watch: echo RUN check:watch                                   &&  svelte-kit sync && svelte-check --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json --watch
scripts.lint: echo RUN lint                                           && prettier  --check . && eslint . && echo DONE lint
scripts.format: echo RUN format                                         && pnpm lint:css --fix && prettier --write .
scripts.quick: pnpm i && pnpm format && pnpm lint && pnpm build:only-sw && pnpm tauri info && pnpm check
scripts.all: pnpm i && pnpm format && pnpm lint && pnpm build:only-sw && pnpm tauri info && pnpm tauri:build && pnpm story:build && pnpm build:netlify && pnpm build:vercel && pnpm test:unit && pnpm test:integration && pnpm check
